Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Medication

Jargon Term: Please resume your usual dialysis schedule. Your last dialysis was [**1-23**].
Please continue to take your medications as prescribed.
You should hold your coumadin today. You can resume this on wednesday at your normal dose.
You should have your INR checked at dialyis as usual on thursday.
If you develop any of the following concerning symptoms, please call your PCP or go to the ED: fevers, chills, chest pains, shortness of breath, nausea, vomiting, or headaches.
